summary: The diff implements a broad revert to restore the project toward Draft Version 510 state. Most acceptance criteria of REQ-37 are addressed: correct app title, splash screen, all routes, Return to Home buttons, admin principal hardcoded, image display via blob storage, role-based access control, and backend structure. One notable discrepancy is found in App.tsx where the frontend-file-summaries.txt explicitly states the ImageViewPage route was removed, yet the route IS present in App.tsx. Overall coverage is strong with minor concerns noted below.

missing_requirements.requirement: backend/migration.mo must be reverted to Draft Version 510 state
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows backend/main.mo being modified. There is no evidence that backend/migration.mo was included in the revert.

hallucinated_features.description: frontend-file-summaries.txt references Interactive3DMap and Interactive3DOwl components using Three.js with WebGL detection and 3D rendering
hallucinated_features.reason: These 3D interactive components are described in the file summaries but there is no indication they existed in Draft Version 510; they appear to be additions beyond the stable baseline being restored.
